texts: Boatmobile is driven by SpongeBob

Plankton always schemes to get the Krabby Patty formula

The treedome is Sandy's home
Mr. Krabs loves money
Money is what Mr. Krabs loves the most
Bikini Bottom is the main setting of SpongeBob
SpongeBob takes place in Bikini Bottom

SpongeBob's pet is a snail named Gary
SpongeBob works at the Krusty Krab
The Krusty Krab is SpongeBob's workplace

Bikini Bottom's superheroes are Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy
Plankton runs the Chum Bucket
The Chum Bucket is owned by Plankton
The Krusty Krab is famous for its Krabby Patties
Krabby Patties are the specialty of the Krusty Krab
SpongeBob is always optimistic
Optimism is a key trait of SpongeBob
Squidward dislikes SpongeBob's enthusiasm
SpongeBob's excitement annoys Squidward

Underwater, Sandy lives in a special dome
The Krabby Patty secret formula is highly coveted
Everyone wants to know the secret behind the Krabby Patty recipe
SpongeBob loves jellyfishing with Patrick
Jellyfishing is SpongeBob and Patrick's favorite activity
Squidward dreams of becoming a famous clarinet player
A famous clarinetist is Squidward's aspiration

The boating school instructor is Mrs. Puff
SpongeBob often annoys Squidward unintentionally
Squidward gets annoyed by SpongeBob without him realizing it

Bikini Bottom's pirate ghost is the Flying Dutchman
Patrick often comes up with silly ideas
Silly ideas are Patrick's specialty
SpongeBob has a pineapple-shaped house
A house shaped like a pineapple is where SpongeBob lives

Money is Mr. Krabs' most prized possession

The Krusty Krab's cook is SpongeBob

Sandy loves creating scientific inventions
Patrick lives under a rock

Plankton's Chum Bucket is unpopular

SpongeBob's driving terrifies Mrs. Puff

A lobster trap inspired the design of the Krusty Krab
Gary communicates by meowing
SpongeBob's snail Gary meows to communicate
SpongeBob has never passed his driving test
SpongeBob consistently fails his boating exams
Patrick is known for his laziness
Being lazy is one of Patrick's defining traits

Karen is Plankton's computer wife
Mr. Krabs has a daughter named Pearl
Pearl is Mr. Krabs' teenage daughter

Bikini Bottom residents visit the Goo Lagoon beach
SpongeBob's laugh is high-pitched and contagious
A high-pitched laugh is one of SpongeBob's trademarks

Squidward's grand performance happened at the Bubble Bowl
Plankton wants to take over Bikini Bottom
Plankton's goal is to dominate Bikini Bottom
Jellyfish Fields is SpongeBob's favorite place to visit
SpongeBob loves exploring Jellyfish Fields

To survive underwater, Sandy uses an air helmet

The Chum Bucket competes with the Krusty Krab

Being alone is something Squidward cherishes
SpongeBob loves blowing bubbles
Blowing bubbles is one of SpongeBob's hobbies

SpongeBob and Patrick often share ice cream

Plankton's plans always fail
Plankton's schemes never succeed

A scary urban legend is the Hash-Slinging Slasher
SpongeBob loves working at the Krusty Krab
The Krusty Krab is SpongeBob's dream job
Bikini Bottom has a variety of quirky residents
The residents of Bikini Bottom are eccentric and quirky
Squidward often paints self-portraits
Painting self-portraits is one of Squidward's hobbies

A villain known as the Dirty Bubble causes trouble in Bikini Bottom

Krabby Patties are SpongeBob's favorite thing to eat

Karen helps Plankton with his schemes

Chaos in Bikini Bottom was caused by the Alaskan Bull Worm
Sandy competes in extreme sports
Extreme sports are a passion of Sandy's
The Bikini Bottom citizens fear the Flying Dutchman
The Flying Dutchman terrifies the people of Bikini Bottom

A clean and organized house is important to SpongeBob
Patrick is known for being clueless but lovable
Lovable but clueless describes Patrick perfectly
Squidward often tries to avoid SpongeBob and Patrick
SpongeBob and Patrick are usually avoided by Squidward
SpongeBob celebrates his best days by singing
Singing is how SpongeBob celebrates his happiest days
Sandy is originally from Texas
Texas is where Sandy comes from
The Krusty Krab's rival is the Chum Bucket
The Chum Bucket competes directly with the Krusty Krab
The Bikini Bottom annual jellyfish festival is a big event
A major event in Bikini Bottom is the annual jellyfish festival
SpongeBob is always cheerful and helpful
Being cheerful and helpful are key traits of SpongeBob
Patrick frequently gives bad advice to SpongeBob
SpongeBob often receives poor advice from Patrick
The Krabby Patty is considered the best food in Bikini Bottom
Bikini Bottom residents love eating Krabby Patties
Sandy likes to practice lassoing skills
Lassoing is one of Sandy's favorite activities
Plankton's restaurant, the Chum Bucket, serves terrible food
The Chum Bucket is notorious for its awful menu

Chaos at the Krusty Krab ensued due to Bubble Bass's order
The My Leg guy is a recurring character in SpongeBob
A character who always yells 'My Leg!' frequently appears
SpongeBob wears a tie with his outfit
A tie is part of SpongeBob's iconic clothing

Plankton relies on his inventions to try to get the secret recipe
Gary is very intelligent despite being a snail
Although a snail, Gary shows remarkable intelligence
SpongeBob is the Krusty Krab's most loyal employee
Loyalty to the Krusty Krab defines SpongeBob as a worker
The citizens of Bikini Bottom celebrate holidays underwater
Underwater holidays are celebrated by Bikini Bottom's citizens
The Flying Dutchman lives on a ghost ship
A haunted ship is home to the Flying Dutchman
Patrick is bad at math but doesn't let it bother him
Math isn't Patrick's strong suit, but he doesn't mind
Mr. Krabs uses old-fashioned methods to run the Krusty Krab
The Krusty Krab operates with traditional methods under Mr. Krabs
Squidward dreams of living in a luxurious house
A luxury home is part of Squidward's aspirations
The Bikini Bottom Zoo has a variety of exotic sea creatures
Exotic sea creatures can be found at the Bikini Bottom Zoo
SpongeBob's pineapple house has three windows
A pineapple-shaped house with three windows is where SpongeBob lives
The Krusty Krab is always busy at lunchtime
Lunchtime is the busiest time at the Krusty Krab
Sandy's rocket caused trouble for Bikini Bottom residents
Bikini Bottom got into trouble when Sandy launched her rocket
Patrick once worked at the Krusty Krab but didn't last long
A short-lived job at the Krusty Krab was held by Patrick
The Bikini Bottom Carnival is a fun event for everyone
Everyone in Bikini Bottom enjoys the Carnival festivities
SpongeBob loves singing the F.U.N. song
The F.U.N. song is one of SpongeBob's favorites to sing

SpongeBob and his friends consult the Magic Conch Shell for guidance
Mr. Krabs has a soft spot for his daughter Pearl
Pearl is Mr. Krabs' most cherished family member
The Krusty Krab delivers food with its new delivery service
A delivery service was recently added to the Krusty Krab's offerings
Plankton sometimes teams up with SpongeBob to solve problems
SpongeBob and Plankton occasionally join forces to fix issues

An underwater treadmill was invented by Sandy

An annual clarinet contest is something Squidward participates in

Jellyfish Fields is where SpongeBob catches jellyfish

An air helmet allows Sandy to breathe underwater

SpongeBob sometimes falls for Plankton's schemes

Jellyfish jelly is made by SpongeBob after jellyfishing

The Elastic Waistband was Patrick's superhero alter ego

SpongeBob's pineapple house was devoured by Nematodes
Mrs. Puff is terrified of SpongeBob's driving skills
SpongeBob's reckless driving terrifies Mrs. Puff
Squidward loves modern art
Modern art is Squidward's passion

Bikini Bottom's residents love visiting the Goo Lagoon
Bubble Buddy is SpongeBob's bubble friend
A bubble named Bubble Buddy is SpongeBob's friend

At the beach, SpongeBob had an embarrassing moment with ripped pants
Squilliam Fancyson is Squidward's rival
Squidward has a rival named Squilliam Fancyson
Mermaid Man shouts 'Evil!' when he sees villains
Villains make Mermaid Man exclaim 'Evil!' loudly
SpongeBob's laugh is very distinctive
A distinctive laugh is one of SpongeBob's trademarks
Patrick lives under a rock
A rock is Patrick's home in Bikini Bottom
Sandy enjoys inventing and building machines
Inventions and machines are Sandy's specialties
The Krabby Patty has a unique flavor loved by everyone
Everyone loves the special taste of the Krabby Patty
SpongeBob has a driver's license that is always revoked
SpongeBob's driver's license gets taken away frequently
Squidward loves peace and quiet
Peace and quiet are what Squidward cherishes most
Patrick loves watching television on his rock
On his rock, Patrick enjoys watching TV
The Krusty Krab was built in the shape of a lobster trap
A lobster trap design was used for the Krusty Krab building

As a comedian, SpongeBob performed stand-up routines
Mr. Krabs has a whale for a daughter
Mr. Krabs' daughter Pearl is a whale
Sandy hosts tea parties in her treedome
Tea parties are hosted by Sandy in her treedome

SpongeBob's house was chaotic during the Jellyfish Jam
Plankton uses Karen, his computer wife, for advice
Karen gives Plankton advice as his computer wife
SpongeBob and Patrick play with bubbles for fun
Playing with bubbles is a favorite activity for SpongeBob and Patrick
The Bikini Bottom bus system is unpredictable
Public transportation in Bikini Bottom is known for being unreliable
SpongeBob and Patrick once raised a clam as parents
Parenting a clam was an adventure for SpongeBob and Patrick
Squidward once pretended to be a musician to impress his rival
To impress Squilliam, Squidward pretended to be a great musician
Plankton has an archive of failed plans
A collection of failed schemes is kept by Plankton

Cooking with cleanliness is SpongeBob's hallmark
Bikini Bottom has an annual boating race
An annual race involving boats is a tradition in Bikini Bottom

Squidward got lessons from SpongeBob on playing the clarinet
Patrick is often clueless about the simplest things
The simplest concepts confuse Patrick
Sandy has a robotic squirrel suit to explore outer space
A robotic suit allows Sandy to venture into space
Mr. Krabs doesn't like spending money unless it's absolutely necessary
Spending money is something Mr. Krabs avoids unless it's necessary
Squidward once tried to start his own art gallery
Starting an art gallery was one of Squidward's dreams
SpongeBob accidentally caused the Krusty Krab's grill to explode
A mishap with the grill led to an explosion at the Krusty Krab
Patrick once won a beauty pageant despite not being prepared
A beauty pageant victory was a surprise for Patrick
Squidward's paintings are often misunderstood by others
Others frequently fail to appreciate Squidward's paintings
Sandy invented a flying machine to travel around Bikini Bottom
A flying machine created by Sandy allows her to navigate Bikini Bottom
Plankton once tried to steal the Krabby Patty formula using a robot
A robot was Plankton's tool for attempting to steal the Krabby Patty formula
Patrick once thought that a rock was a good pet
A rock was Patrick's idea of a great pet
SpongeBob can't resist helping others, even if it causes problems
Helping others is something SpongeBob can't avoid, even if it's troublesome
Squidward loves to complain about the noise from SpongeBob's laughter
SpongeBob's loud laughter bothers Squidward
Mr. Krabs once tried to hide his money from SpongeBob and Squidward
Hiding his wealth from SpongeBob and Squidward was Mr. Krabs' goal
Sandy has a deep appreciation for science and engineering
Science and engineering are passions of Sandy
Plankton tried to use hypnotism to get the Krabby Patty formula
Hypnotism was one of Plankton's schemes to steal the recipe
Patrick once opened a rock store to sell rocks
A rock store was Patrick's business venture
SpongeBob and Patrick love playing practical jokes on Squidward
Practical jokes on Squidward are something SpongeBob and Patrick enjoy
Sandy often performs karate with SpongeBob
Karate is a regular activity that SpongeBob enjoys with Sandy

A raise was Mr. Krabs' reward for SpongeBob's dedication
Squidward's dream is to be a successful artist and musician
Squidward aspires to achieve fame as an artist and musician
Patrick sometimes gets confused by simple instructions
Simple instructions often leave Patrick confused
SpongeBob and Patrick once tried to start a band together
A band was formed by SpongeBob and Patrick as part of a fun experiment
The Flying Dutchman once tried to take over Bikini Bottom
Bikini Bottom was nearly taken over by the ghostly Flying Dutchman
SpongeBob once got his dream job at the Krusty Krab after a lot of hard work
Hard work helped SpongeBob achieve his dream job at the Krusty Krab
Sandy often provides solutions to problems with her scientific knowledge
Science is Sandy's go-to tool for solving problems
Plankton uses his computer wife, Karen, to execute his plans
Karen, Plankton's computer wife, helps with his evil plans
Mr. Krabs once opened a rival restaurant to the Krusty Krab
A rival restaurant was once opened by Mr. Krabs
Patrick loves spending time with SpongeBob, even if they do nothing
Doing nothing together is one of Patrick's favorite activities with SpongeBob
SpongeBob and Squidward once teamed up to save the Krusty Krab
Saving the Krusty Krab required SpongeBob and Squidward's cooperation
Patrick once believed he could be a famous TV star
A career as a famous TV star was something Patrick dreamed of
SpongeBob enjoys making Krabby Patties more than anything else
Making Krabby Patties is SpongeBob's greatest joy
Sandy uses science to create fire underwater in her treedome
Sandy's scientific skills help her start fires underwater
SpongeBob once tried to make a fire underwater using a magnifying glass
Using a magnifying glass, SpongeBob tried to create a fire underwater
Sandy built a fireproof treedome to keep her experiments safe
To protect her experiments, Sandy constructed a fireproof treedome
SpongeBob and Patrick created fire underwater using a special science device
A science gadget was used by SpongeBob and Patrick to start a fire underwater
Sandy once demonstrated how to make a fire underwater with a chemical reaction
A chemical reaction was used by Sandy to demonstrate fire creation underwater
Patrick accidentally started a fire underwater by rubbing two rocks together
By rubbing rocks together, Patrick unknowingly created a fire underwater
Sandy's fire starting techniques are a result of her expertise in underwater science
Expert knowledge of underwater science enables Sandy to start fires
Squidward once witnessed Sandy's fire starting experiment underwater
Sandy's fire experiment underwater was something Squidward found fascinating
Mr. Krabs wanted to start a fire underwater to cook a special Krabby Patty
A fire underwater was what Mr. Krabs desired for making a unique Krabby Patty
SpongeBob learned how to start a fire underwater for an emergency situation
In an emergency, SpongeBob used science to start a fire underwater
